## Octavos
```{r}
porra_list[["octavos"]] %>% 
    mutate(across(everything(),
                  ~ cell_spec(.x,"html",
                                background = ifelse(.x %in% equipos_octavos, "green", ""),
                                color = ifelse(.x %in% equipos_octavos, "white", "")))) %>% 
    kbl(format = "html", escape = F) %>% 
    kable_paper(full_width = F)
```
